views.markdown:
Enable native PiP in iOS YouTube app.

YouPiP best supports the latest version of YouTube. You may downgrade to as far as version 15.10.4 but full compatibility for older versions is low-priority.
- You may now enable or disable YouPiP from its settings
- Fixed PiP not activating for some people
- Fixed "Fake YouTube version" not restoring the old video bar for some people
- Fixed crashing when activating PiP with "Legacy PiP" enabled on recent YouTube versions
- Added ro, tr localization, Updated ar, zh_tw localization

- Fixed crashing when activating PiP on YouTube 17.41.2
- Added de, hu, it, ja, ko, nl localization, Updated vi, zh_cn localization

- Removed workaround code for iSponsorBlock (1.0-15) when its controls are displayed on the video overlay
- Added ar, pt, zh_cn localization
- Fixed missing video overflow options when Fake YouTube version is enabled
- Fixed PiP closing itself for videos autoplaying in Home feed
- Fixed PiP not working sometimes with the mini-player (credits to @level3tjg)

- Added missing parentResponder property to YTPlayerPIPController (iOS 14-) in YouTube 17.23.6
- Added fr, zh_tw localization
- Fixed compatibility with YouTube 17.23.6

- Added vi, ru localization
- Deprecated Sample Buffer Hack
- Made app version warning alert YouTube-style

- Moved all YouPiP settings into its own category (under General section)
- Added "Fake YouTube version" setting (for YouTube newer than 16.46.5)
- Added "Disable PiP for Mini Player" setting (credits to @level3tjg)
- Fixed compatibility with YouTube 17.16.4
- Tweaked PiP icon in video tab bar, for those who still have it (credits to @dayanch96)
- Fixed regression introduced in 1.6.7
- Fixed rare crashing when playing videos on iOS 12
- Fixed PiP still activating on app dismiss in some situations when PiP button is enabled
- Fixed crashing on YouTube 17.03.2 when playing a video with Legacy PiP on
- Fixed possible crashing when displaying compatibility alert (credits to @bakedpotato191)
- Fixed app crashing on iOS 13- when skipping ads (credits testing to @NguyenASang)
- Fixed PiP not working on iOS 12- for clean YouTube install
- Added "Use Video Tab Bar PiP Button" setting (credits to @BandarHL)
- Fixed support for iOS 12-
- Made Legacy PiP enabled by default for iOS 11/12 (regression fix for 1.5.13)
- Made PiP toggle displays for non-premium users on YouTube 16.40.3

- Known issue: PiP may not work on iOS 12
- Fixed crashing on some older YouTube versions
- Enforces legacy video decoder when legacy PiP is enabled

- Compiled with iOS 15.0 SDK
- Added PiP controller injection into YTAutonavEndscreenController for better iOS 13- compatibility
- Fixed PiP controller not working on iOS 13- in recent YouTube versions
- Minor code optimizations
- Fixed YouPiP settings not showing on older versions of YouTube
- Fixed crashing on YouTube 16.29.4
